name: Redball factory
description:
Welcome

An opportunity to create your own toys empire is here, but instead of selling different toys for different prices. It would be easier to only sold one, that's right! Let's make a ton of redballs and sell them to kids. An abondened factory nearby is a perfect place to start, let's create your first redball and start a journey to be the best

How to start?

To make a great and perfect redball is of course a tiny rubber ball, and soul. How to get a soul? Hunt them of course, there's plenty of them in the middle of the town. Once you have it, you can create it and sell it. Now keep increasing the price for your balls because you need money. And start buying some tools to help you on your work, cause you can only work alone for this kind of job. A helpfull machine will definetly help a lot.
